column6: Lo que está muerto no puede morir.

column2: Like a true son of the Iron islands, [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has been slain during the assault. We shall honour him by reaving boldly on!

column6: Como un verdadero hijo de las Islas del Hierro, [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] ha encontrado la muerte durante el asalto. Debemos honrarlo por haber vencido y haber muerto como un verdadero Hijo del Hierro!

column2: Ironborn longships cut through the water swift and sure, hence we have have successfully pursued a small merchant fleet. If we were to attack and pay our Iron Price for their cargo, we could gain much and more.

column6: Los barcolunegos herreños hienden las aguas velozmente, persiguiendo con éxito una pequeña flota mercante. Si atacamos y pagamos el precio del hierro por sus cargamentos, podríamos ganar un gran botín.

column2: [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] fearlessly decided to attack a merchant flotilla, and the enemy crews were no match for [From.GetHerHis] Ironborn. They sank their poorly manned escorts, siezed there cargo and slew or took captive many men. This is why we follow the Old Way!

column2: [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]'s decision to attack a merhcant fleet was sound, the fleet was fairly well defended.
